segments.text: How did you find your apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can check on the bulletin boards at school for local housing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if I need a roommate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are websites that can hook you up with a roommate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do apartments cost around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on what you want . Do you want a one - or two-bedroom apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just need a one-bedroom apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will probably cost you around twelve hundred dollars a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you come with me to look at apartments ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would be happy to look at apartments with you .
segments.speaker: S2
